class.name: dynamics_controllers/KdlChainController
class.description: Computes the efforts based on the Inverse Dynamics of a kinematic chain. Wraps around controllers compatible with an EffortJointInterface.

class.name: dynamics_controllers/KdlTreeController
class.description: Computes the efforts based on the Inverse Dynamics of a kinematic tree. Wraps around controllers compatible with an EffortJointInterface.
